org.cooperari.feature.monitor

Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cooperari.feature.monitor.Monitor

  • public final class Monitor
extends Object
    Representation of a monitor.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Monitor NULL
      Instance representing an invalid monitor, when monitor operations involve the null reference.
      static Monitor UNREFERENCED_MONITOR
      Instance representing an unreferenced monitor.

      Constructs a new monitor.

        public static final Monitor NULL
        Instance representing an invalid monitor, when monitor operations involve the null reference.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Monitor

        public Monitor(int id,
               Object object)
        Constructs a new monitor.
        Parameters:
        id - Id for the monitor.
        object - Object the monitor relates to.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        public long getId()
        Get monitor id.
        Returns:
        Monitor id.

      • getObject

        public Object getObject()
        Get object the monitor refers to.
        Returns:
        A Object instance.

      • references

        public int references()
        Get reference count.
        Returns:
        A value greater or equal to 0.

      • addReference

        public int addReference()
        Increment reference count.
        Returns:
        Updated value of reference count.

      • removeReference

        public int removeReference()
        Decrement reference count.
        Returns:
        Updated value of reference count.

      • isLocked

        public boolean isLocked()
        Test if monitor is currently locked.
        Returns:
        true if some thread owns the monitor.

      • getOwner

        public CThread getOwner()
        Get owner thread.
        Returns:
        Owner thread or null if monitor is not locked.

      • getOwnerLockCount

        public int getOwnerLockCount()
        Get owner lock count
        Returns:
        0 if monitor is not locked, a value greater than 0 otherwise.

      • enter

        public void enter(CThread t)
        Enter monitor.
        Parameters:
        t - Thread that is allowed to acquire the monitor.

      • exit

        public void exit()
        Exit the monitor

      • relinquish

        public int relinquish(CThread t,
                      boolean wait)
        Relinquish the lock.
        Parameters:
        t - Thread that must be the owner.
        wait - Indicates that calling thread will be on the wait set.
        Returns:
        Current owner lock count of the thread.

      • reacquire

        public void reacquire(CThread t,
                      int lockCount)
        Re-acquire the lock.
        Parameters:
        t - Thread that will reacquire ownership.
        lockCount - Lock count to re-establish.

      • getNotifyEpoch

        public int getNotifyEpoch()
        Get current notification epoch.
        Returns:
        Current value of the notification sequence number.

      • consumeNotification

        public int consumeNotification()
        Consume a notification.
        Returns:
        Sequence number for removed notification.

      • notifyOneThread

        public void notifyOneThread()
        Deliver a notification for one thread waiting on this monitor.

      • notifyAllThreads

        public void notifyAllThreads()
        Deliver one notification per each thread waiting on this monitor.

      • availableNotification

        public boolean availableNotification(int seq)
        Get available notifications greater or equal than a given sequence number.
        Parameters:
        seq - Sequence number.
        Returns:
        true iff such a notification exists.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
